title: Ruwanmage , Palayanthota Thudugala
location: by road connecting from Ruwanmage to palayanthota road and thudugala, Dodangoda
details: A money worth Land for both Residential use or for Cultivation. Currently I have gowned 5 yrs + Rubber Trees 75 nos approx. Still I have not done the first pealing and harvesting the Rubber Milk. Also considerable amount of Cinnamon Plants are also grown. This plot is just in front of Fair Vay Land Sales Land plot.
